RibbonXML:
<customUI xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/2009/07/customui">
<ribbon startFromScratch="true">
<tabs>
  <tab id="EditTab" label="Edit" visible="true">
  
         <group id="Edit" label="Edit Text">
              <control idMso="Undo" label="Undo" enabled="true"/>
            <control idMso="Cut" label="Cut" enabled="true"/>
            <control idMso="Copy" label="Copy" enabled="true"/>
               <control idMso="Paste" label="Paste" enabled="true"/>
         </group>
        <group id="EditGroup" label="Edit Records">
          <button id="Edit1" label="Copy" onAction="MenuEditProductList.Copy Record" imageMso="Copy"/>
             <button id="Edit2" label="Insert" onAction="MenuEditProductList.Insert Record" imageMso="TableInsertRowsBelow"/>
             <button id="Edit3" label="Delete" onAction="MenuEditProductList.Delete Record" imageMso="TableDeleteRows"/>
              <button id="Edit4" label="Select All" onAction="MenuEditProductList.Select All Records" imageMso="SelectAllRecords"/>
             <button id="Edit5" label="Copy and Insert Selection" onAction="MenuEditProductList.Copy and Insert Selected Record(s)" imageMso="CopyToFolder"/>
          </group>
 </tab>

  <tab id="Report" label="Reports" visible="true">
     <group id="ReportGroup" label="Product List Reports">
          <button id="Report1" label="Detail by Item" onAction="MenuReportProductList.Product List Detail by Item" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>
             <button id="Report2" label="Cost by Item" onAction="MenuReportProductList.Product List Cost by Item" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>
             <button id="Report3" label="Cost by Room" onAction="MenuReportProductList.Product List Cost by Room" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>
              <button id="Report4" label="Detail by Category" onAction="MenuReportProductList.Product List Detail by Category" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>
             <button id="Report5" label="Summary by Category" onAction="MenuReportProductList.Product List Summary by Category" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>
            <button id="Report6" label="Notes" onAction="MenuReportProductList.Notes" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>

         </group>
 </tab>

  <tab id="Export" label="Export" visible="true">

       <group id="ExportGroup" label="Export">
               <button id="Export1" label="Compare Product List Cost to Parts List Cost" onAction="MenuExport.Compare List Cost to Parts List Cost" imageMso="GroupCompare"/>
             <button id="Export2" label="Export Components and Additional Cost to Estimating App" onAction="MenuExport.Export Component and Additional Costs to Estimating app" imageMso="ExportXmlFile"/>
             <button id="Export3" label="Export Selected Items to Another Product List" onAction="MenuExport.Export Selected Items to Another Product List" imageMso="ExportTextFile"/>
      </group>
  </tab>

  <tab id="Lists" label="Lists" visible="true">

     <group id="ListsGroup" label="Lists">
               <button id="Lists1" label="New" onAction="MenuFileProductList.New List" imageMso="QueryMakeTable"/>
             <button id="Lists2" label="Rename(Selected Items)" onAction="MenuFileProductList.Rename List (Selected Items)" imageMso="DatasheetColumnRename"/>
             <button id="Lists3" label="Delete" onAction="MenuFileProductList.Delete List" imageMso="TableDelete"/>
              <button id="Lists4" label="Settings" onAction="MenuEditProductList.Product List Settings" imageMso="GridSettings"/>
            <button id="Lists5" label="Search Notes" onAction="MenuSearchProductList.Search Notes" imageMso="SearchUI"/>
           <button id="Lists6" label="Show/Hide Costs" onAction="MenuCostProductList.Show Cost" imageMso="SearchUI"/>
      </group>
       <group id="DesignGroup" label="Designs">
            <button id="Design1" label="New Alternate" onAction="MenuFileProductList.New Design Alternate" imageMso="QueryMakeTable"/>
             <button id="Design2" label="Rename Alternate" onAction="MenuFileProductList.Rename Design Alternate" imageMso="DatasheetColumnRename"/>
        </group>
        <group id="ArchiveGroup" label="Archives">
            <button id="Archive1" label="View Current Lists" onAction="MenuArchiveProductList.View Current Lists" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
             <button id="Archive2" label="View Archived Lists" onAction="MenuArchiveProductList.View Archived Lists" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
            <button id="Archive3" label="Archive Selected List" onAction="MenuArchiveProductList.Archive List" imageMso="QueryMakeTable"/>
             <button id="Archive4" label="View KRH Lists" onAction="MenuListProductList.KRH Lists" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
            <button id="Archive5" label="View Revit Lists" onAction="MenuListProductList.Revit Lists" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
      </group>
   
 </tab>

  <tab id="Goto" label="Goto" visible="true">
   <group id="GotoGroup" label="Goto Form">
          <button id="Goto1" label="CNC Commands" onAction="MenuParts.CNC" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
             <button id="Goto2" label="Parts List" onAction="MenuParts.Parts List" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
              <button id="Goto4" label="Main Menu" onAction="MenuParts.Main Menu" imageMso="GoTo"/>
           </group>

 </tab>
          </tabs>
</ribbon>
</customUI>

<customUI xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/2009/07/customui">
<ribbon startFromScratch="true">
<tabs>
<tab id="dbCustomTab" label="KR+H Print" visible="true">
<group id="dbCustomGroup" label=" ">
<control idMso="PageSetupDialog" label="Page Setup" enabled="true"/>
<control idMso="PrintDialogAccess" label="Print" enabled="true"/>
<control idMso="PrintPreviewClose" label="Close" enabled="true"/>
</group>

<group id="dbCustomGroup1" label="Export">
<button id="Export" label="Export to Excel" onAction="MenuFileReportsExport" imageMso="MicrosoftExcel"/>
</group>
</tab>
</tabs>
</ribbon>
</customUI>

<customUI xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/2009/07/customui">
<ribbon startFromScratch="true">
<tabs>
  <tab id="dbCustomTab" label="KR+H" visible="true">
  <group id="mmGotoGroup" label="Goto Form">
          <button id="mmGoto1" label="CNC Commands" onAction="MenuParts.CNC" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
             <button id="mmGoto2" label="Parts List" onAction="MenuParts.Parts List" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
             <button id="mmGoto3" label="Product List" onAction="MenuParts.Product List" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
</group>

 
   </tab>
          </tabs>
</ribbon>
</customUI>

<customUI xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/2009/07/customui">
<ribbon startFromScratch="true">
<tabs>
  <tab id="FileGroup" label="KR+H Parts List" visible="true">
  
  <group id="Edit" label="Edit Text">
  <control idMso="Undo" label="Undo" enabled="true"/>
  <control idMso="Cut" label="Cut" enabled="true"/>
  <control idMso="Copy" label="Copy" enabled="true"/>
  <control idMso="Paste" label="Paste" enabled="true"/>
  <control idMso="FindDialog" label="Find" enabled="true"/>
  </group>
 
  <group id="EditGroup" label="Edit Records">
  <button id="Edit1" label="Copy" onAction="FormFile.CopyItem" imageMso="Copy"/>
  <button id="Edit2" label="Paste" onAction="FormFile.PasteItem" imageMso="Paste"/>
  <button id="Edit3" label="Delete" onAction="MenuEditProductList.Delete Record" imageMso="TableDeleteRows"/>
  <button id="Edit4" label="Select All" onAction="MenuEdit.Select All Records" imageMso="SelectAllRecords"/>
  </group>

 <group id="ReportGroup" label="Parts List Reports">
 <button id="Report1" label="Parts List by Item" onAction="MenuReportPartsList.Parts List Report" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>
 <button id="Report2" label="Parts Multiples" onAction="MenuReportPartsList.Parts Multiples Report" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>
 <button id="Report3" label="Parts Summary" onAction="MenuReportPartsList.Parts Summary Report" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>
 <button id="Report4" label="Material/Process" onAction="MenuReportPartsList.Material/Process Report" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>
 <button id="Report5" label="Material" onAction="MenuReportPartsList.Material Report" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>
 </group>
 
<group id="ProcessesGroup" label="Processes Reports">
<button id="Processes1" label="All Categories" onAction="MenuPartsProcesses.All Categories" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>
<button id="Processes2" label="Assembly/Finish/M+S" onAction="MenuPartsProcesses.Assembly/Finish/M+S" imageMso="ShowDetailsPage"/>
</group>
 
<group id="ExportGroup" label="Export">
<control idMso="ExportExcel" label="Export to Excel" enabled="true"/>
</group>

<group id="SaveGroup" label="Save">
<button id="Save1" label="Parts List" onAction="MenuPartsExport.Save Parts List" imageMso="FileSaveAs"/>
</group>
  
<group id="GotoGroup" label="Goto Form">
<button id="Goto2" label="Product List" onAction="MenuParts.Product List" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
<button id="Goto1" label="CNC Commands" onAction="MenuParts.CNC" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
</group>

 </tab>
 </tabs>
</ribbon>
</customUI>

<customUI xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/2009/07/customui">
<ribbon startFromScratch="true">
<tabs>
  <tab id="FileGroup" label="KR+H CNC Commands" visible="true">
   
<group id="GotoGroup" label="Goto Form">
<button id="Goto1" label="Product List" onAction="MenuParts.Product List" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
<button id="Goto2" label="Parts List" onAction="MenuParts.Parts List" imageMso="ViewsFormView"/>
</group>

 </tab>
 </tabs>
</ribbon>
</customUI>
